description: Like the concept, but unless you have actually piloted a tactical submarine single-handed, then it is unlikely you will be able to use this.

Took me a while to figure out how to control the submarine, cause there is no tutorial(yet) but was able to figure it out... However I couldn't figure out what's the mission...
As for stability it crashed when I fired a torpedo...
summary: What am I supposed to do in this game?!

description: No instructions at all. How do you even play this game? Seems like no thought was put into this.
